key.name: Vile pests are attacking the farm, and only you can stop them! Plant springy seeds to send these baddies flying.
Angry monkeys ahoy! It's a simian brawl above the sea. Don't let these monkeys hit you with their produce!
Don't choose the same direction! A game of wits against Pink Bean!
Don't choose the same direction! A game of wits against Blake!
同じ方向を選択しちゃダメ！\n別の方向を選択すれば成功！\nブラックビーンとの真剣勝負、あっち向いてホイ！
